traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.desc: The dwarf has advantage on saving throws against poison and has resistance to poison damage

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The mage is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The mage has the following wizard spells prepared: * Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation * 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield * 2nd level (3 slots): misty step, suggestion * 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fireball, fly * 4th level (3 slots): greater invisibility, ice storm * 5th level (1 slot): cone of cold
